metadata.title: CVE-2016-3878 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: decoder/ih264d_api.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-09-01mishandles the case of decoding zero MBs, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file,aka internal bug 29493002.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
